No nukes, the Infecticon cannon can't be fired any more, Iron Fist's 
weapon doesn't get used, (don't ya' hate it when the other side 
feels that you don't need a nuke, or an extrememly large weapon for 
that matter). The word you are looking for is most 
likely "Atlantis". Unless you can convince someone to let you level 
their base, you're not going to get permission from me.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: What about the main turret on the Iron Fist, and
> that cannon thing the Infecticons have (don't ya' hate
> it when the other side did their homework).  A nuke
> you could only use once and overall would be less
> damaging. Granted I would momentarily hold the power
> of life and death over any one base (or maybe I should
> go through with my theory I've had for a while we got
> the word "Atlantice" from "Alliance" not to hard to
> change over millions of years), but still the bots
> could easily evacuate before it hit, all that was lost
> could be rebuilt.
